page.title: 16SHAFTON VILLAGE & SCHOOL
page.content: Ours is a very old{village,}with many old houses. The{Working Men's {Club}is next to our school; it used to be a farmhouse. It opens at 1900 and closes at 2300; it has a dartboard and a pool room and you can buy drinks like lager and beer. Our{school}was built in 1911; a new hall was built in 1968. In 1923 when children went there from 5 to 14 there were {496 {children}at the school but now there are only{171; since 1968 it has been a {First School.}We have a big field where we have our sports and football matches. Our Headteacher is Mr Skipworth. Most of our dads work for the NCB but the next highest number of people are{unemployed;}my dad says we will all be out of work if {Mrs Thatcher}stays as{Prime Minister.
